item.title: RSA Prime Decryption
item.description: Description and usage of a decryption script that I wrote for CTF Challenges.

item.title: SDL: Bolt on or Built in?
item.description: Time is of the essence. Every day that a business is anything less then fully secure is a day exposed to hackers. It’s also another day that developers continue building applications without factoring security into their lifecycle.
